title: 2D ISOMETRIC MEDIEVAL HOUSES SPRITE SET
description: This sprites set includes 9 basic isometric medieval house elements shapes, and 45 decorative elements which allows you to construct various house designs.   Most of elemements are customizable and have layering options.
longDescription:
This sprite set allows you to construct various unique isometric medieval houses of a diffrent shapes, with rich choise of a decorative\architecture elements. 

Graphics style of this set is best suitable for indie\casual\farm game.

Most of elemements are customizable and have layering options, which allows to overlap elements (for example - wooden wall beam is layered, and can overlap window or door element)

Every element in this set is hand-drawn on a graphic tablet by a real human (me). No AI was used!


This set consists of:

  • 4 various house shapes each in 2 angles.
  • 5 house additional constructive elements - 3 types of annexes, mansard roof, and dormer roof - each in 2 angles. Each of mentioned before element have 3 roof color options
  • Shop and stables - each in 2 angles.
  • Furnace with lit (not animated) and unlit state (can be used as depiction of oven depends on game context) - one angle.
  • Anwil, bellows, and bellows stand (can be used as table sprite, if used without bellows) - one angle.
  • two types of stairs - each in 2 angles.
  • two types of shop baskets - each in 2 angles.
  • 2 types of doors - each in 2 angles.
  • 3 types of windows - each in 2 angles.
  • 2 types of poorch roofs (can be used as window roof) - each in 2 angles.
  • 2 types of shop\tavern signs, each with 3 colors of a background, and 5 different emblems (stable,tavern,potion shop, blacksmith, and dragon)- each in 2 angles.
  • Outdoor clock, with layers option, which turn it into 3rd type of a sign, with mentioned before color backgrounds and emblems. - in 2 angles.
  • 4 types of chimneys - big one, in height of a big building, and 3 types of a small roof chimneys - each in 2 angles.
  • Gate (with optional stable emblem) - 2 angles.
  • Trough - 2 angles.
  • Hay pile with optional pitchfork - 1 angle.
  • Manure sprite with optional fly swarm sprite(flys not animated) - 1 angle
  • 7 sprites of a fence.
  • Additional wooden beams - 2 types, each in 2 angles.
  • Weather vane - one angle.
  • Lantern - 2 angles.
  • 3 types of grass isometric tile.
  • 3 types of a pavement tile.

All shadows sprites are separated and can be edited/separated from its element.
technicalDetails:
Each element is aviable as PNG file imported into unreal project and in layered PSD file.


Demonstrational uproject file include composed elements and houses, layering and overlaping of sprites is realized through"Translucency Sort Priorty" - Readme.txt file include a description of an intended Sort Priorities for each element.


Number of textures - 380

Number of sprites - 379 (there is one less sprites than textures, because this texture is used for tileset - ground and pavement)

9 PSD files in "Source" folder (+9 .uasset examples) - 5 files contains original layred files of houses sprites, which can be used for editing, chandges, or for a simplification of a layering structure, in case if your project reqire different way of use for this composite sprites. 4 other PSD files is an example of a various designs, which you can make with this sprite set (you can see this examples on a preview images of this set).


This number (379 sprites) include layering options for some elements, which consist of a few sprites, also shadows sprites.


Sprite sizes: 

Various, from 2048x2048 px (bigger house assets) to 256x256 px (smallest elments, such as ground tiles or lantern)

Each file pixel dimensions is ajusted to power of 2 rule.

Previev images have marked 256x256 square, for better visual understanding of a sprites scale.


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


If you have any questions regardless this sprite set, feel free to write me at mishael.k@gmail.com. Best of luck!
